mapper.select: select id, from_area, unit_code, unit_type, unit_name, unit_nature, job_code, job_name, job_type, job_desc, number, exam_type, education, degree, zhongzhuan_zy, dazhuan_zy, benke_zy, yanjiusheng_zy, other_demand, enroll_date, end_date, remarks from student.position where id = #{id}

select id, from_area, unit_code, unit_type, unit_name, unit_nature, job_code, job_name, job_type, job_desc, number, exam_type, education, degree, zhongzhuan_zy, dazhuan_zy, benke_zy, yanjiusheng_zy, other_demand, enroll_date, end_date, remarks from student.position limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into student.position(from_area, unit_code, unit_type, unit_name, unit_nature, job_code, job_name, job_type, job_desc, number, exam_type, education, degree, zhongzhuan_zy, dazhuan_zy, benke_zy, yanjiusheng_zy, other_demand, enroll_date, end_date, remarks) values (#{fromArea}, #{unitCode}, #{unitType}, #{unitName}, #{unitNature}, #{jobCode}, #{jobName}, #{jobType}, #{jobDesc}, #{number}, #{examType}, #{education}, #{degree}, #{zhongzhuanZy}, #{dazhuanZy}, #{benkeZy}, #{yanjiushengZy}, #{otherDemand}, #{enrollDate}, #{endDate}, #{remarks})
mapper.update:
update student.position
from_area = #{fromArea},
unit_code = #{unitCode},
unit_type = #{unitType},
unit_name = #{unitName},
unit_nature = #{unitNature},
job_code = #{jobCode},
job_name = #{jobName},
job_type = #{jobType},
job_desc = #{jobDesc},
number = #{number},
exam_type = #{examType},
education = #{education},
degree = #{degree},
zhongzhuan_zy = #{zhongzhuanZy},
dazhuan_zy = #{dazhuanZy},
benke_zy = #{benkeZy},
yanjiusheng_zy = #{yanjiushengZy},
other_demand = #{otherDemand},
enroll_date = #{enrollDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
where id = #{id}
